sqlMap.select:
/* faa/cav/005/FAACAV005EMainselect */
SELECT ROWNUM AS KEY, MNSUM_YM, DECODE(MNSUM_DVSN_CD,'01','세입금','02','세출금','03','특별계정','05','국고예금') MNSUM_DVSN_CD, ACP_DH FROM TWFAACAV044H WHERE 1 = 1
AND MNSUM_YM = #strYm#
AND MNSUM_YM BETWEEN #strYr#||'01' AND #strYr#||'13'
AND MNSUM_YM LIKE '____'||#strMm#
AND MNSUM_DVSN_CD LIKE #strMnDvsn#
ORDER BY KEY, MNSUM_YM, MNSUM_DVSN_CD, ACP_DH
